âŠ¢ Eq (derivWithin (fun y => Star.star (f y)) s x) (Star.star (derivWithin f s x))
decl:
protected theorem derivWithin.star :
    derivWithin (fun y => star (f y)) s x = star (derivWithin f s x) := by
  rcases uniqueDiffWithinAt_or_nhdsWithin_eq_bot s x with hxs | hxs
  Â· exact DFunLike.congr_fun (fderivWithin_star hxs) _
  Â· simp [derivWithin_zero_of_isolated hxs]
